TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SizeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 類別是用來將某一種資料型別轉換成另一種資料型別。

span.span: The class is used to convert from one data type to another.

summary.span: 這個類別可透過 物件來存取。

span.span: Access this class through the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.

span.span: Converts the specified object to the specified type.
The converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的類型轉換為字串型別來回。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 預設實作會呼叫物件方法的物件是否有效，而且如果目的型別是字串。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果這個方法無法將指定的物件轉換成目的型別，它會傳遞例外狀況。If this method cannot convert the specified object to the destination type, it passes a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.

param.span: 新屬性值的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of new property values.

param.span: 字典包含了一系列的名稱/值組，每一個都會從 方法傳回一個屬性。

span.span: The dictionary contains a series of name-value pairs, one for each property returned from the method.

summary.span: 藉由使用指定的物件屬性值組，來建立這個型別的物件。

span.span: Creates an object of this type by using a specified set of property values for the object.

summary.span: 這對於建立擁有可變更屬性的不可變更物件非常有用。

span.span: This is useful for creating non-changeable objects that have changeable properties.

returns.span: 新建立的物件，或 (如果無法建立物件)。

span.span: The newly created object, or if the object could not be created.
The default implementation returns .

summary.span: 擷取這個型別的屬性集。

span.span: Retrieves the set of properties for this type.

summary.span: 根據預設值，型別不傳回任何屬性。

span.span: By default, a type does not have any properties to return.

returns.span: 應該公開給這個資料型別的屬性集。

span.span: The set of properties that should be exposed for this data type.

returns.span: 如果沒有屬性應該公開，則會傳回 。

span.span: If no properties should be exposed, this may return .

returns.span: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 。

span.span: The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的簡單實作可呼叫正確資料型別的 方法。An easy implementation of this method can call the method for the correct data type.
